      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Television News 2</string>
            <string language="en">Television News 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fernsehen-Nachrichten 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelles 2 De Télévision</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notícia 2 Da Televisão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notizie 2 Della Televisione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεοπτικές ειδήσεις 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Noticias 2 De la Televisión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">The purpose of this assignment is to explore cultural, social and political questions in relation to the English-speaking world by comparing different news media.Modul 5 - Media.Ingår i Engelska B - CFL.</string>
            <string language="en">The purpose of H ice assignment ice to explore cultural, social wild duck political questions in relationship to the English-speaking world village comparing different news the mediums.

Module 5 - the mediums.

Is included in English B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Engelska B</string>
            <string language="sv">engelska</string>
            <string language="sv">English B</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>
            <string language="sv">media</string>
            <string language="sv">television</string>
            <string language="sv">television news</string>
            <string language="sv">assignment</string>
            <string language="en">English B</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">English B</string>
            <string language="en">english</string>
            <string language="en">the mediums</string>
            <string language="en">tele vision</string>
            <string language="en">tele vision news</string>
            <string language="en">assignment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck des H Eis-Anweisung Eises, politische 
Fragen der kulturellen, wilden sozialente im Verhältnis zum 
englischsprechenden Weltdorf zu erforschen, das unterschiedliche 
Nachrichten das mediums.Module 5 vergleicht - das mediums.Is schloß 
in englischem B ein - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de la glace d'affectation de glace de H 
d'explorer des questions politiques de canard sauvage culturel et 
social dans le rapport avec le village d'expression anglaise du monde 
comparant des nouvelles différentes le mediums.Module 5 - le 
mediums.Is a inclus dans B anglais - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade do gelo da atribuição do gelo de H 
explorar perguntas políticas do pato selvagem cultural, social no 
relacionamento à vila english-speaking do mundo que compara a 
notícia diferente o mediums.Module 5 - o mediums.Is incluiu em B 
inglês - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo del ghiaccio di assegnazione del ghiaccio 
di H esplorare le domande politiche dell'anatra selvaggia culturale e 
sociale nel rapporto al villaggio anglofono del mondo che confronta le
notizie differenti il mediums.Module 5 - il mediums.Is ha incluso in B
inglese - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός του πάγου εργασίας πάγου χ για να ερευνήσει 
τις πολιτιστικές, κοινωνικές άγριες πολιτικές ερωτήσεις παπιών 
σε σχέση στο αγγλόφωνο παγκόσμιο χωριό που συγκρίνει τις 
διαφορετικές ειδήσεις η εκπαιδευτική ενότητα 5 μέσων - τα μέσα 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται στο αγγλικό β - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito del hielo de la asignación del 
hielo de H de explorar preguntas políticas del pato salvaje cultural,
social en lazo a la aldea de habla inglesa del mundo que compara 
diversas noticias el mediums.Module 5 - el mediums.Is incluyó en B 
inglés - CFL.</string>
          </description>
